To achieve the above you’d probably want to look into using pseudo elements. However, there may be some limitations if a customer updated a section background color as the colors may not match.
In addition, you’ll want to add some custom margin to each section to account for the added vertical space in the pseudo elements, and that may cause some confusion if a customer edits the spacing in their sections.
One other approach may be to create pngs that you can set as background images that give the desired appearance.
To make sure I’m understanding correctly, there is no way to give a user the options for preset background - they can only manually select images. Correct?
